metadata.description: Check out these ALL-ACTION Wolverine tales, all in fantastic BLACK AND WHITE! Josh Fialkov and the fantastic gray wash art of Paco Diaz pit Wolverine against South Pacific pirates...and worse. Then, X-FORCE writer Christopher Yost introduces a sniper with a secret -- and a canuckle-head to kill! Finally, comics legend Ted McKeever tells a third island adventure!
metadata.name: Rampaging Wolverine
